scripts.push: npm version patch && npm publish . && git push
scripts.cz: git add . && git status && git cz && npm version patch && npm publish .
scripts.test: standard *.js && istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- -r co-mocha --reporter spec --timeout 100000 --recursive tests/
scripts.coveralls: istanbul cover _mocha -- -r co-mocha --reporter spec --timeout 100000 --recursive tests/ && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | coveralls && rm -rf ./coverage
